subject: Re: [junit] Re: ClassLoader constraints violation
msgSnippet: ... Had I known about the -noloading switch, I would probably have used it too. ... Erik
messageBody:
"Rupert" <rupert@...> wrote:
> I went with John's -noloading switch, since it seemed quicker and
> easier and I tend to restart the TestRunner for each execution - it
> worked fine. I can see Erik's excluded.properties providing a finer-
> grained control that might be of use in different circumstances.

Had I known about the "-noloading" switch, I would probably have used it too.
:)


Erik
